front.title: Finding Discontinuities of Piecewise-Smooth Functions
front.abstract: Formulas for stable differentiation of piecewise-smooth functions from noisy data are developed. The locations and number of discontinuity points, as well as the sizes of jumps across these points, are determined stably without prior knowledge of their positions. Error estimates are provided, and the method extends classical stable differentiation results to piecewise-smooth functions, including detection of discontinuities in derivatives.
